name: Dimensions (Gamechatter)
description:
This is another game I'm working , its still early in development , so expect some form of glitches or bugs. 

Travel between different dimensions and battle various different enemies.

Collect power ups to increase your health.

Fight deadly bosses.

Dimensions. 

Controls 

A - Left 

D - Right

Space - Jump , Double jump if tapped twice

Left mouse click - fire bullet

S - To Save

L - To Load
